Dari Telkomsel Sampai Instagram Tumbang Berbarengan
05 Nov 2019, 16:03 by Tim - detikInet


Ilustrasi. Foto: Unspslah

Jakarta - Hari ini, beberapa layanan populer tumbang atau sempat ngadat dalam waktu tidak berjauhan. Dari Telkomsel dan IndiHome, kemudian Ovo dan Instagram. Berikut rangkumannya.TelkomselTopik Telkomsel siang tadi sempat menjadi yang paling ramai dibahas di Twitter lantaran terjadi gangguan internet. Netizen banyak mengeluhkan tak bisa online.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Telkomsel membenarkan sempat terjadi gangguan layanan. Akan tetapi setelah dilakukan perbaikan, layanan mereka mulai berangsur normal."Telah terjadi penurunan kualitas layanan data internet yang disebabkan oleh gangguan pada akses internet international Telkom Group, sedangkan untuk layanan voice dan SMS tetap berjalan normal," demikian keterangan dari Aldin Hasyim, GM External Corporate Communications Telkomsel, Selasa (5/11/2019)."Saat ini layanan internet mulai berangsur pulih dan kami terus mengupayakan agar layanan internet dapat kembali normal. Kami menyampaikan permohonan maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi," tambahnya."Telkomsel akan senantiasa berkomitmen untuk memberikan pelayanan terbaik bagi seluruh pelanggannya," pungkas Aldin.IndiHomeTopik IndiHome melesat berbarengan dengan Telkomsel di Twitter, di mana netizen juga melontarkan keluhan terhadap layanan IndiHome. Ketika dikonfirmasi, pihak Telkom membenarkan telah terjadi gangguan akses internet internasional Telkom Group selama beberapa waktu. Untungnya, perbaikan berjalan lancar dan Telkom menyatakan semua layanan sudah kembali normal."Terkait adanya gangguan akses internet internasional TelkomGroup, dapat kami informasikan bahwa proses perbaikan telah selesai dilakukan," sebut VP Corporate Communication Telkom Indonesia, Arif Prabowo dalam keterangannya."Gangguan yang sempat terjadi selama 45 menit ini dapat disolusikan pada pukul 11:10 WIB. Saat ini semua layanan TelkomGroup sudah beroperasi normal," tambahnya"Telkom memohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang sempat dialami pelanggan yang terkena dampak gangguan. Proses recovery sudah selesai dilakukan dan pelanggan dapat menggunakan layanan TelkomGroup kembali seperti sedia kala. Kami terus berkomitmen memastikan kualitas infrastruktur jaringan produk dan layanan TelkomGroup untuk pengalaman terbaik pelanggan," pungkas Arif.(ke halaman selanjutnya) (fyk/fay)

From Telkomsel to Instagram Tumbang Together
05 Nov 2019, 16:03 by Team - detikInet


Illustration. Photo: Unspslah

Jakarta - Today, several popular services have collapsed or had crashed in the distance. From Telkomsel and IndiHome, then Ovo and Instagram. The following is a summary. TelkomselTelik Telkomsel this afternoon was the most popular topic discussed on Twitter due to internet disruption. Many netizens complained about being unable to go online. When confirmed, Telkomsel confirmed there had been a service disruption. However, after improvements were made, their services began to return to normal. "There has been a decline in the quality of internet data services caused by disruptions to Telkom Group's international internet access, while voice and SMS services have remained normal," said information from Aldin Hasyim, GM External Telkomsel Corporate Communications, Tuesday (11/5/2019) "Nowadays internet services are gradually recovering and we continue to work to get internet services back to normal. We apologize for the inconvenience," he added. "Telkomsel will always be committed to provide the best service for all of its customers, "concluded Aldin. IndiHomeTopik IndiHome sped along with Telkomsel on Twitter, where netizens also made complaints about IndiHome's services. When confirmed, Telkom confirmed that the Telkom Group had interrupted international internet access for some time. Fortunately, the repair went smoothly and Telkom said all services had returned to normal. "Regarding the interruption of TelkomGroup international internet access, we can inform you that the repair process has been completed," said Telkom Indonesia VP Corporate Communication, Arif Prabowo in his statement. this 45 minutes can be resolved at 11:10 WIB. Now all TelkomGroup services are operating normally, "he added." Telkom apologizes for the inconvenience experienced by the affected customers. The recovery process has been completed and customers can use the services. "TelkomGroup is back to the way it was before. We continue to be committed to ensuring the quality of TelkomGroup product and service network infrastructure for the best customer experience," concluded Arif. (To the next page) (fyk / fay)
